actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed management of the construction of a Saudi Arabia National Guard Headquarters complex by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.

summary.text: Expresses Congressional disapproval of the proposed management of the construction of a Saudi Arabia National Guard headquarters complex by the United States Army Corps of Engineers as proposed by the President on October 23, 1975.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution disapproving the proposed management of the construction of a Saudi Arabia National Guard Headquarters complex by the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
